meanings.definition: A group of fishes belonging to the family Cichlidae.
meanings.sent1: The chromides in the aquarium swam gracefully.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of chromides in their natural habitat.

meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound containing chromium.
meanings.sent1: The chemist analyzed the chromides under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The factory produced chromides for industrial use.
